snippet: Alex Avila’s two-run homer with two outs in the bottom of the 11th inning gave Detroit a stunning 13-12 victory over Boston.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Detroit Tigers defeat Boston Red Sox, 13-12; other baseball results noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Avila’s two-run homer with two outs in the bottom of the 11th inning gave Detroit a stunning 13-12 victory over Boston.

headline.seo: Tigers Beat Red Sox on Avila’s Homer in 11th
headline.main: Tigers Beat Red Sox on Homer in the 11th
headline.print_headline: Tigers Beat Red Sox On Homer In the 11th
